content: wyif k1 p1tbl 5 times k1 p to last 12 sts k1 p1tbl 6 times repeat row 1-2 until yoke depth measured down the front from bottom of collar is 11 25 11 75 12 25 12 75 13 5 13 75 14 25 15 15 / 28 5 30 31 32 5 34 5 35 36 38 38 cm © sonder yarn co 2024 | www sonderyarnco com | for personal use only turtle dove cardigan | page 5 separate body & sleeves all sizes change to us 7 / 4 5 mm needles maintain rib at fronts as set and rm as you come to them work across left front sts place the 45 48 49 54 59 61 67 round 1 k1tbl p1 to end 72 78 left sleeve sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn co 4 4 4 4 4 6 6 6 6 sts using the backwards loop method repeat round 1 until cuff measures 2 5 / 6 5 cm k across back sts to next m place the 45 48 49 54 59 61 67 72 78 right sleeve sts onto stitch holder or waste yarn bobble in patt co 4 4 4 4 4 6 6 6 6 sts work to end maintaining ribbing at the front sts 179 191 207 221 239 255 273 finishing 289 307 sts use a crochet slip_stitch chain see special techniques on body ws of sweater at base of collar ribbing to stabilize the neckline begin and end the crochet chain just inside the maintaining rib at fronts as set work in st st until body ribbing panels on the left and right of cardigan fronts measures 5 5 6 6 6 5 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 / 14 15 15 16 5 16 5 18 19 20 21 5 cm from underarm or until desired weave in ends and close small gaps at underarm steam or length note the hem rib will add 3 / 7 5 cm to the length wet block to finished measurements being careful not to stretch neck rib hem rib change to us 7 / 4 5 mm needles row 1 rs sl1 pwise wyib p1 k1tbl to end row 2 ws sl1 pwise wyif k1 p1tbl to end repeat row 1-2 until hem rib measures 3 / 7 5 cm bobble in patt sleeves place 45 48 49 54 59 61 67 72 78 sleeve sts on us 9 / 5 5 mm circular needles pick up and k 3 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 4 sts from underarm pm to indicate bor pick up and k 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 more sts from the underarm join for working in the round 50 53 54 59 64 68 74 79 85 sts work in st st for 6 6 6 6 6 4 4 4 4 rnds decrease round k1 k2tog k until 3 sts remain ssk
